## üì• Installation

1. ### üö∞ Tap this repo

   ```sh
   brew tap 5ouma/formula
   ```

1. ### üßæ Install preferred tools

   - #### [üöÄ gh-dash](https://dlvhdr.github.io/gh-dash)

     ```sh
     brew install gh-dash
     ```

   - #### [‚å®Ô∏è mksei](https://gist.github.com/miclf/bf4b0cb6de9ead726197db7ed3d937b5)

     ```sh
     brew install mksei
     ```

   - #### [üìë mli](https://github.com/5ouma/mli)

     ```sh
     brew install mli
     ```
